comments: Roos is actually amazing. She can be tough because she won\'t teach "elementary school" skills and she moves fast. IF you ask questions, she will go back. Classwork everyday. Homework is a must. Tests aren\'t that bad, she gives review sheets before and drops the lowest test. Go to her tutoring if you need it. You either know it or you don\'t.

Her tests are straightforward and her in class work is not as bad as it seems. Whoever has her for Math101 or any other Math class is quite lucky.
